content.html: Everybody is on the "This is Fox News's fault" and, it is. But I want to focus on another community I follow closely: Gamers. I tend to follow streamers/YouTubers who explicitly *don't* go in for these white supremacist dog whistles (obviously) but a lot of them don't call it out
content.value:
Everybody is on the "This is Fox News's fault" and, it is. But I want to focus on another community I follow closely: Gamers.
I tend to follow streamers/YouTubers who explicitly *don't* go in for these white supremacist dog whistles (obviously) but a lot of them don't call it out

content.html: "Gamers" has been a wholly right wing captured demographic since 2014. 'Gamergate' was nothing but a mainstreaming of white supremacist ideals into gaming culture. You will now find someone repeating them in almost every mainstream gaming outpost you go.
content.value:
"Gamers" has been a wholly right wing captured demographic since 2014. 'Gamergate' was nothing but a mainstreaming of white supremacist ideals into gaming culture. 

You will now find someone repeating them in almost every mainstream gaming outpost you go.
